Package com.redis.ds.ds_redis

Class RedisDS

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_redis.RedisDS
public class RedisDS extends Object
The Redis Data Source class manages connections with one or more Redis Server processes. It developed against the Jedis programmatic library which is maintained and supported by Redis. You can use RedisDS to instantiate subclasses for Redis core, graph, JSON, search and time series operations within a Redis database.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:
  • OSS Redis Commands
  • Jedis GitHub site
  • Intro to Jedis â€“ the Java Redis Client Library
  • Apache Commons Pool

      Parameters:

    • open

      public void open(String aHostName, int aPortNumber, int aDBId, String aDBAccountName, String aDBAccountPassword, boolean aSSLEnabled) throws RedisDSException
      Creates a client instance configured with properties that will be used to establish one or more connections to a Redis Server.
      Parameters:
      aHostName - Host name where Redis Server is running
      aPortNumber - Port number Redis Server is listening on
      aDBId - Data base id
      aDBAccountName - Database account name
      aDBAccountPassword - Database password
      aSSLEnabled - Is SSL enabled
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception

    • finishMarker

      public void finishMarker(String aName, long aMemoryInBytes)
      Capture the end of a marker name in the log/stream. In addition, if the memory-used-in-bytes parameter is non-zero, then capture those details too.
      Parameters:
      aName - Marker name
      aMemoryInBytes - Memory in bytes or zero (which will be ignored)

    • finishMarker

      public void finishMarker(long aMemoryInBytes)
      Capture the end of a marker name in the log/stream. In addition, if the memory-used-in-bytes parameter is non-zero, then capture those details too.
      Parameters:
      aMemoryInBytes - Memory in bytes or zero (which will be ignored)

    • saveStreamAsWriter

      public void saveStreamAsWriter(String aKeyName, PrintWriter aPW) throws RedisDSException
      Save the Redis stream data set identified by the key name to the PrintWriter stream in a format compatible with 'redis-cli'.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Redis stream key name
      aPW - PrintWrite stream instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation exception

    • saveStreamAsFile

      public void saveStreamAsFile(String aKeyName, String aPathFileName) throws RedisDSException, IOException
      Save the Redis stream data set identified by the key name to the external path/file name in a format compatible with 'redis-cli'.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Redis stream key name
      aPathFileName - Absolute path/file name to store the commands
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation exception
      IOException - File I/O exception

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shutdown all inactive connections. This method should be invoked when the application is done with communications to the Redis Server.
